channel.title: Iportal317
channel.description:
Hey guys were here is Iportal317
Website: *
We are going to change the name but here is a picture of the load up screen. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2881jjm.png[/img]
We will be hosting this off a dedicated server with over 8GB RAM! that can hold over 200+ users!
Updates: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2hhehdf.png[/img] -[COLOR="Yellow"]I am creating models to make new items![/COLOR] -We are planning to make this not just a runescape private server but it will have alot of events and NPC's! -[COLOR="Lime"]We are creating actual POKEMON NPC into the game!(we are debating if it should be monsters you can attack, right now its just like a person that you talk to, also we are trying to make a outfit so you can look just like one![/COLOR] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/9rn193.png[/img] -If you know how to model you can join us make new items -Currently making a full outfit for server admins (it will show a shirt saying your admin etc.) -Making some kind of shield with rsportal logo [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/59t20.png[/img] -added rsportal cape (this is not the official cape) ONLY for server admins [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/11kus0y.jpg[/img] -made a mask(will make more features to it later) [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/jikhlf.png[/img] -made a lightsaber lol [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/b4x9tx.png[/img] -[SIZE="4"][COLOR="Yellow"]THANKS Alessandro Conforto for the donation of 13 USD! Please contact me[/COLOR][/SIZE] -added Pokeball [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/9pz0a9.jpg[/img] -added bulbasuar [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/miclc6.jpg[/img] -added lugia [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/jafack.jpg[/img] -having fun [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/i5d7jm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2hhehdf.png[/img]

item.title: Iportal317
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

Nice Work. So your basicly a Pokemon/Runescape server.

item.title: Iportal317

item.description:
@gids wrote:

Hey guys were here is Iportal317

Website: *

We are going to change the name but here is a picture of the load up screen.

2881jjm.png751×560

We will be hosting this off a dedicated server with over 8GB RAM! that can hold over 200+ users!

Updates:

2hhehdf.png756×500

-[COLOR=“Yellow”]I am creating models to make new items![/COLOR]
-We are planning to make this not just a runescape private server but it will have alot of events and NPC’s!
-[COLOR=“Lime”]We are creating actual POKEMON NPC into the game!(we are debating if it should be monsters you can attack, right now its just like a person that you talk to, also we are trying to make a outfit so you can look just like one![/COLOR]

-If you know how to model you can join us make new items
-Currently making a full outfit for server admins (it will show a shirt saying your admin etc.)
-Making some kind of shield with rsportal logo
59t20.png1352×757

-added rsportal cape (this is not the official cape) ONLY for server admins

-made a mask(will make more features to it later)
jikhlf.png1415×838

-made a lightsaber lol
b4x9tx.png1418×876

-[SIZE=“4”][COLOR=“Yellow”]THANKS Alessandro Conforto for the donation of 13 USD! Please contact me[/COLOR][/SIZE]
-added Pokeball

-added bulbasuar

-added lugia

-having fun
